SELECT * FROM ( SELECT cn.ID AS ID, CN.TITLE AS TITLE, TJSI.NAME AS NAME, CN.READ_COUNT AS READ_COUNT, CN.CREATED_AT AS CREATED_AT, NVL( (SELECT sum(cnl.NOTICE_LIKE) - SUM(cnl.NOTICE_DISLIKE) FROM CP_NOTICE_LIKE cnl WHERE cnl.NOTICE_ID = cn.id ), 0) AS score FROM CP_NOTICE cn INNER JOIN TL_JIC_STAFF_INFO tjsi ON TJSI.STAFF_PK = CN.STAFF_PK ORDER BY SCORE DESC ) WHERE rownum <= 3
